internships.name: Summer Internship
internships.applicationProcess: Online application portal → Technical assessment → Interview → Selection
internships.description: Ideal for gaining industry experience during summer break, open to 2nd and 3rd year students with competitive stipend and potential for conversion to PPO.

internships.name: Semester Internship
internships.eligibility: Final year students, minimum 7.5 CGPA, PPO conversion eligible
internships.applicationProcess: Online application portal → Technical assessment → Interview → Selection
internships.description: Longer internship duration for final year students with higher stipend and strong PPO conversion opportunity.

internships.name: Research Internship
internships.eligibility: All years, minimum 8.5 CGPA, research interest required
internships.applicationProcess: Research proposal submission → Technical interview → Research fit assessment → Selection
internships.description: Perfect for students interested in research, with opportunities for publication and PhD preparation.

internships.name: Startup Internship
internships.eligibility: All years, entrepreneurial mindset required, can pursue during any semester
internships.applicationProcess: Profile submission → Founder interview → Culture fit assessment → Offer
internships.description: Ideal for students interested in entrepreneurship and startup ecosystems with flexible terms and equity options.

internships.name: Final Year Project as Internship
internships.eligibility: Final year students (7th-8th semester), minimum 6.5 CGPA
internships.applicationProcess: Project registration → Company allocation → Weekly mentorship → Evaluation
internships.description: Combine final year project requirements with industry internship for dual benefits of academic credit and professional experience.

internships.name: International Internship
internships.eligibility: Final year students, minimum 7.5 CGPA, valid passport, visa sponsorship provided
internships.applicationProcess: Online application → Technical assessment → Video interview → Background check → Visa processing
internships.description: Unique opportunity to work internationally with visa sponsorship, higher stipend, and global experience.
